description: Try our easy to follow Apple & Walnut Coffee Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Apple & Walnut Coffee Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel, core and slice the apples and arrange on top of cake mixture. To make crumble topping: combine extra brown sugar, cinnamon and butter together with flour and rub together until crumbled. Stir in walnuts. Sprinkle topping over apple. Bake for 45 minutes or until cooked when tested with a skewer. Cool on a wire rack.
